localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: askBetty gives Slack users instant access to a live personal assistant who can complete bite-sized admin or concierge-type tasks. Through a tailored one-to-one conversation, Betty can: review copy, source quotes, secure dinner reservations & more!
blogPost.body: askBetty gives Slack users instant access to a live personal assistant who can complete bite-sized admin or concierge-type tasks. Through a tailored one-to-one conversation, Betty can: review copy, source quotes, secure dinner reservations & more!
blogPost.title: askBetty - Instant access to a live virtual assistant through Slack
blogPost.author: Bobbie Racette

localize.description: askBetty为Slack用户提供了即时访问一个活生生的私人助理的机会，他可以完成小规模的管理或礼宾型任务。通过量身定制的一对一对话，Betty可以：审阅文案、提供报价、确保晚餐预订等。
localize.tagline: 通过Slack即时访问实时虚拟助理。

localize.description: askBetty爲Slack用戶提供了即時訪問一個活生生的私人助理的機會，他可以完成小規模的管理或禮賓型任務。通過量身定製的一對一對話，Betty可以：審閱文案、提供報價、確保晚餐預訂等。
localize.tagline: 通過Slack即時訪問實時虛擬助理。

previous.excerpt: Meet Red: the only full-featured, professional Redis client written from the ground-up for the Mac! Red provides a powerful yet wonderfully simple interface to interact with Redis.
previous.title: Red - A powerful and beautiful Redis client for Mac

localize.description: Red：唯一一个从头到尾为Mac编写的全功能、专业的Redis客户端。Red提供了一个强大而又简单的界面来与Redis进行交互。
localize.tagline: 一个强大而漂亮的Mac版Redis客户端

localize.description: Red：唯一一個從頭到尾爲Mac編寫的全功能、專業的Redis客戶端。Red提供了一個強大而又簡單的界面來與Redis進行交互。
localize.tagline: 一個強大而漂亮的Mac版Redis客戶端

next.excerpt: warpAR is a free augmented reality app for iOS that lets you distort the textures of the real world. Tap and drag to reshape buildings or turn murals into swirls of color using a set of liquify tools.
next.title: warpAR - Distort real world textures using augmented reality

localize.description: warpAR是一款iOS上的免费增强现实应用，让你可以扭曲现实世界的纹理。点击并拖动来重塑建筑物，或使用一组液化工具将壁画变成颜色的漩涡。
localize.tagline: 利用增强现实技术扭曲现实世界的纹理

localize.description: warpAR是一款iOS上的免費增強現實應用，讓你可以扭曲現實世界的紋理。點擊並拖動來重塑建築物，或使用一組液化工具將壁畫變成顏色的漩渦。
localize.tagline: 利用增強現實技術扭曲現實世界的紋理
